item.title: The feds’ new open-access policy: Who’s gonna pay for it?
item.description: The feds’ new open-access policy: Who’s gonna pay for it? Currently, researchers often have to choose between publishing and science.

item.title: Why we enjoy fear: the science of a good scare
item.description: Why we enjoy fear: the science of a good scare The thrill of a frightening film can feel euphoric – and mild horror, say researchers, can also help foster lasting psychological resiliencePalms sweat, heartbeat quickens, muscles tense.
